newsitem.title: INDIA: India's Great Eastern plans $50 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: India's Great Eastern plans $50 mln FRN.

text.p: Indian shipping company Great Eastern Shipping Company Ltd plans to raise $50 million through a floating rate note (FRN) issue, an official of ANZ Grindlays Bank in Bombay said on Monday.
"We are expecting a wide distribution among investors across Asia and Europe," Rana Kapoor, General Manager, Corporate Finance and Capital Markets at ANZ Grindlays, told Reuters.
He said the issue, a seven-year bullet, was scheduled to be launched in the last week of September or early October. Terms of the issue would be decided at roadshows later this month.
Kapoor said the funds would be used by Great Eastern to acquire ships. "It is India's premier shipping firm. We are helping them to raise funds on an unsecured basis," he said.
